product.title: The Unscented Company - Dryer Balls - Box of 3
product.body_html:
3 pack. (2 grey balls + 1 white ball)

500 + loads

Soft on laundry. Gentle on earth. A natural earth-friendly and long-lasting substitute to liquid and sheet fabric softener. Prevents static cling, reduces drying time by 25%, softens naturally, and reduces wrinkles.

For that natural feeling of softness: Toss 3 balls in your dryer with your laundry and voilà! Safe for cloth diapers and sensitive skins.

What it’s made of: Pure natural South-American wool from free-range sheep

Our wool is processed locally through low-impact and earth-friendly methods for a minimal carbon footprint.

COMPOSTABLE

FRAGRANCE AND DYE FREE

EARTH FRIENDLY

Made in Canada by Moss Creek Wool Works
